headers.subject: [tosdr:1707] [Bad] Spotify price changes take effect immediately

html:
Spotify warns you if there is a change in the price of  subscription, but that change is implemented immediately, without delay. This means that if they change the price they day before your renewal, you will be charged the new price.

Spotify may change the price for the Paid Subscriptions from time to time, and will communicate any price changes to you. Price changes for Paid Subscriptions will take effect at the start of the next subscription period following the date of the price change. By continuing to use the Spotify Service after the price change takes effect, you accept the new price.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/ 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

text:
Spotify warns you if there is a change in the price of  subscription, but 
that change is implemented immediately, without delay. This means that if 
they change the price they day before your renewal, you will be charged the 
new price.

Spotify may change the price for the Paid Subscriptions from time to time, 
> and will communicate any price changes to you. Price changes for Paid
